Infinite Sword Kang Jin-seong!
The appearance of no hunters representing Korea. And unexpectedly it was the North Korean army who charged with them.
Clean up the monsters!
Hundreds of North Korean hunters hit the sides of the monsters. The appearance of North Korean troops out of nowhere is also an appearance but I saw a familiar person in Hari's eyes.
Uncle Goo Dae-seong?!
Koo Dae-seong and his colleagues. They were jumping into the middle of the battlefield stabbing monsters with their spears.

chapters.title: Chapter 222
chapters.content:
< Koo Dae-sung (1) >
Damn... that's too many.
Goo Dae-seong and the resistance fighters who entered downtown Pyongyang were fed up with seeing the devil's army filling the city.
Mr. Gu... are you really going to go there?
Their power is two no-hunters and guild members representing Korea. A total of 300 people including the most elite North Korean hunters and man-at-arms recruited from the resistance army.
The power of about 300 people all made up of hunters was by no means weak.
A moderate amount of red gates can be cleared if there are about 100 people and if there are 300 people depending on the number of S-class hunters the black gate can also be challenged.
The fact that 300 superhumans gathered is to demonstrate that much power. But-
It seems that there are more than 100000 that I can see right now.
Ah~ a lot a lot. There's a lot of dirty garbage.
The number of enemies was so great that even Kang Jin-seong and Cheon Jin-soo the legendary S-rank hunters in Korea were fed up.
The number of 300 is such a shabby unit in this fierce battlefield where 10000 hunters gather and 1000000 enemies flock.
If at least communication is connected...
Goo Dae-seong witnessed the moment satellites around the world crashed and ran straight to this place.
In the process they tried to communicate with Yapi and the main body of the Pantheon several times but there was no relay to relay their communication as satellites all over the world were destroyed.
Even if the emergency communications network is restored it will be too far away before communications can be restored in the middle of this battlefield.
This is the path that I detoured as much as possible. If I penetrate 1km I can join the allies but...
Beyond that Han Hari the Knights of the Pantheon Man-at-Arms and hunters recruited from Korea and around the world could be seen fighting the demons.
But within 1km of that.
It's a problem that there are only tens of thousands of units in that distance right?
The road to the main base of the allies was too rough and full of threats.
Okay me this old man and the North Korean army are heading over there. But you guys remain here.
Unexpectedly Cheon Jin-su ordered to stay while watching Goo Dae-sung and Man-at-Arms. No it won't be unexpected.
Is it because we... are weak?
I know.
Goo Dae-sung and Man at Arms. It's not to the extent that the skill is evaluated as ‘bad'.
Rather it's okay to give them a half grade higher than their original skills when it comes to unity and group tactics.
But top C. At least the lowest rank in B class. Cheon Jin-soo judged that if that was the limit for the knights and their subordinates it would be impossible to break through the battlefield of Abigyu-hwan.
But we must go too.
The answer was almost the same as Koo Dae-sung and Kim Do-han.
Even if you are a young knight friend why are you guys?
That... Goddess Ariana and God Petos said that those who run away from the battlefield are doomed.
When we die we must go to paradise.
For very religious reasons. But now it was an accident that melted into their lives.
“And our armed forces are probably more faithful than you. Sir Yapi gave us the latest type of armor because we were struggling in a foreign country.”
Cheon Jin-soo and the other Hunters also realized that. In the battle with the Great Old One Mergiola even the star iron weapons that the Man-at-Arms carried as secondary weapons were a little less than the Legendary level.
We'll be able to withstand quite a bit with our overall defense. Then we'll have to give it a higher class.
Average B-rank Hunter. Cheon Jin-soo and Kang Jin-seong smiled bitterly at Captain Kim Do-han's words that this would be enough.
It will be more dangerous than you think. Stay close.
Cheon Jin-soo raised his sword. Kang Jin-seong was also at the forefront.
After that elite hunters with Shingeom and Cheongseong fill the torso with North Korean soldiers and Man-at-Arms.
depart.
In the next moment Cheon Jin-soo and Kang Jin-seong swept the lead with the strongest firepower they could.
Following the two elders I will run unconditionally and join the main unit!
It's fucking running!
The distance from the main unit is about 1 km. If it's far it's far but if there are two legendary S-class hunters the most elite new sword guild and the Qingcheng guild members——
Don't save your magic! Pour it all out!
“Don’t spare even those who can use the Holy Law!”
The wizards belonging to them used bombardment magic and the believers in the guild who were even appointed to the pantheon used their own spells.
They are two guilds that are considered to be strong S-class raiders. They followed the strongest guild leaders and began to break the demons with their mighty potential.
-······!?
- These guys?!
Even the demons are taken aback by the sudden side breakthrough. It was unexpected that new units would appear here.
- Fight back.
-Move the rear troops. Guys are few. Swallow it.
The world's most bizarre creatures stood in their way. Goo Dae-sung lifted his shield above his upper body on a horse and withstood the intense collision.
Kuh...!
Mr. Goo!
He staggers in the face of a huge snake-like creature and barely escapes falling. Goo Dae-seong swung a star-steel sword at the torso of the guy passing by with his still long body.
-Chack!
Kiie Aeg!
The snake devil's scream resounds. Goo Dae-sung's sad iron sword is like rat poison to demons.
‘And yet I couldn't cut it! It's not enough power!'
The snake demon rushed at him with rage after barely scratching his torso but—
It's a bit big to eat boshintang.
Papapak! Dozens of swords pierce the head of the snake demon. Some of Kang Jin-seong's cloned star-steel swords were to defeat the snake demon.
Go thank you!
Goo Dae-seong expresses his gratitude for the help of Kang Jin-seong who is also busy fighting at the forefront. But what came back was the urging of a twisted old man.
Run fast! You're falling behind!
Oops!
Goo Dae-seong hurriedly grasps the reins. He confirmed that the Man-at-Arms were following him and gradually moved towards the main unit.
The distance is about 800m.
‘you can do it! If I get a little closer I'll be able to receive the protection of the Holy Grail Knights!'
If so the combat power of Man-at-Arms would be several times that. It was a calculation that his allies would respond so he could join.
But if there's something he's overlooked——
【 Aura of Chaos 】
◆Effect
: Weakness chaos terrifyingness confusion tetanus screaming fear confusion despair body decay mental pollution soul erosion────
There is no Holy Grail Knight's protection on this battlefield.
Keugh?!
A nightmare-like curse that becomes clearer the closer you get to Rakshaar as you enter the battlefield. It was such a powerful debuff that even the two S-class hunters lost their strength.
Sir the Holy Grail Knight! Lord Vulcanus and Queen Beatrice are...!
He believed that if he came here he would receive the protection of his allies. However there is no blessing as expected and a nightmare-like curse slows down the body.
Heo-eok heo-eok... heeik...!
The first to collapse were the North Korean hunters.
They don't believe in the existence of God. Unlike the pantheon which can survive with faith in this nightmare-like space the North Korean army's patriotism which was firmly rooted in the existence of evil has collapsed.
And if you hesitate even for a second on this battlefield death will soon strike you.
- Kiyiik!
Oh no!
The moment he stopped the demons grabbed the soldier's arm. Carried away in an instant he became a plaything for grotesque demons and died of being torn limb from limb.
Don't hesitate! I'm joining the main squad now!!
Goo Daeseong exclaimed. He snatched and dragged a North Korean hunter who had just been snatched up by the devil's tentacles.
He ran half-forced by the horse but he who was an elite hunter barely came to his senses and did not stop matching the horse's stride.
Aww!
Save...!
But when Goo Dae-sung only saved one three North Korean hunters were dragged to death.
“Geuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu...]] It's too heavy!
Even if the armor can withstand it the body can't stand it!
The effectiveness of the star iron armor was enormous even at this moment. She showed considerable resistance with her pure defense but her body could not withstand the debuff and was collapsing.
But that too has its limits. They were inherently inferior in specs and the limits that could be overcome with the performance of their armor were clear.
-Kraaaaaa!
A club wielded by a giant troll leaping out from the side.
Stop Team 3!
The five of them become one body to block the sticking but with a dizzying impact the five of them collapse at once.
the legs stop
this···!
When Koo Dae-seong was about to turn his horse and launch a reverse charge to rescue them...
- Papapak!
An arrow flew from somewhere and pierced the troll's head. It was Lee Yong-wan.
Allies are coming in! Cover!
Lee Yong-wan and the long-range hunters who witnessed their approach from the building shot arrows and their precise shooting support saved the Man-at-Arms from danger.
Damn it! That's too much! Extra firepower! Shoot it in the eye!
- Giggles!
It was the center of the main unit that responded to Lee Yong-wan's cry. They were the Krashatria warriors who had mobilized most of the tribe's warriors for this battle.
They aimed their shell cannons fashioned to fit their massive shells and fired like mortar shots.
-Shhhh!
The shells drawing a parabola flew into the air and landed soon after.
-bang! Kwak!
- Kwa-kwa-kwa-kwa! Quaang!
The artillery support of the Kikkiruk warriors was seasoned. They provided artillery support only in the area where the monsters were concentrated but immediately stopped the bombardment when they were concerned about a mistake by their allies.
And the moment the shelling became more frequent——
Charge forward!!
With Cheon So-yeon's command the Naju Knights squeeze through the gap and break through.
The distance between them is 600m. However due to the precision sniper support in the high-rise building and the shelling of the kikkiruk tribe it is in a state where a large hole has been pierced.
The demons in the middle of both units suddenly found themselves in a position where they were attacked from both sides.
breakthrough!
And the clumsy army without formation was an easy prey for the Knights.
It was already too late when demons and monsters who had been waking up from the aftermath of the bombardment with the sound of horses stepping on the asphalt noticed their approach.
Legion Spell < Wedge Charge >.
At the same time as the collision the meat pieces were torn apart and the bouncing sound resounded brutally.
Papapak from beyond! Goo Dae-seong exclaimed excitedly at the sight of the enemy jumping up and down.
Allies are coming! Let's do our best!
Not only Man-at-Arms but also the North Korean army which has been collapsing wakes up and runs to wear out the soles of their feet.
And they reach the point where they recognize each other.
Hunter Goo Dae-sung! Hunter Kim Do-han too!
Ha Manager Han Hari!
The knights of the pantheon who identify each other with their old titles. The moment they tried to join each other with the momentum they were running—
[You fools. It was a mistake to move the knights to save those guys.]
The midpoint where the two units meet. A magic circle is engraved in the sky above the place where demons and monsters are still mixed.
Classic bombing magic. It exerts lethal power in chaotic battlefields and in situations where it is impossible to warn of danger while the radio is blocked.
The Great Demon of Wisdom the Supremacy of Magic poured out a massive bombardment that hit the Knights and Man-at-Arms.

< Koo Dae-sung (2) >

Ugh... Hey he's alive here.
I think my ears have gone bad...
Man-at-Arms rising one by one. Goo Dae-seong was relieved that they were safe but soon his expression distorted.
Uh ugh...!
My my leg. My leg!
The shield of protection was a shield with great power but it was not enough to cover the entire unit.
Keugh...!
The most lagging comrades were bombarded. There······.
‘My back is broken! Isolated!'

A colleague who barely manages to recover is bitten by a giant monster's mouth and disappears.

Mr. Koo Dae-sung! Step back first!
Kim Jae-hyeok who dropped thunder and dealt with the devil with a mighty blow. But even that didn't last long. The demon slashed at him with his claws.

ah.
short flurry. Her demons who snipe her Hari attack her.
sister!

It was because he was so focused on wiping out the incoming enemies that he didn't pay attention to the long-range defense method. She was able to live because her armor made entirely of star iron prevented her from being fatally wounded.
[Are these new articles?]
······!
A sharp blade attacking the back of Suho who supports Hari. Suho raises his shield belatedly but the blade cut through the gap and cuts through his thighs and waist.
Keugh...!
Suho-kun!
Goo Dae-seong urgently rushed to help him. But-
[What are you?]
I'm sorry.
Goo Dae-sung groaned and tried to touch the blood spattering on his face.
Gu Mr. Koo Dae-sung!
Suho's urgent voice. Goo Dae-seong made a puzzled expression when he saw his shield rolling on the floor.
‘Why is the shield over there...'
Why is the shield tightly strapped to my left arm——
Avoid!
- Kaang!
The sound of metal crashing in your ears. He realizes that it is a picture of a Bakdo wielded by a giant demon measuring more than 2m colliding with the protective shield that surrounds him.
[You've become weak.]
The devil had six arms. And also six knives. The sword he wielded blew the two of them apart with the shield of protection.
It's black...!
······!!
Seeing the two people rolling on the floor unseemly the Great Devil clicked his tongue.
[Compared to them I'm weak. You are not a real knight.]
An efficient battle in which the four knights the core of the Naju Knights were accurately shot and neutralized. This is the result of less than a minute since the two Great Demons intervened in the battle.

Screams were heard but the two never looked back.
Hoping they'll lose themselves while hunting the others.
Go Gob-sama are you here!
The place where Gansin arrived was the Daedonggang River basin that led to the sewer. There a goblin demon was waiting for them.
Chu let's go! Hurry up!
Ah yep!
The goblin demon quickly boarded a small submarine hidden in the river. Of course Gob jumps down without hesitation and throws himself into the submarine.
Up great one what the hell is this?
Although he accidentally boarded the submarine Raynald looked up and asked what kind of submarine it was.
One of the eleven escape routes in case the Lord of Chaos is defeated! We ride this and fall into the sea!
Ahhh······.
Archdemon of great wisdom. How far can you look...
wise man.
Raynald swore to follow him to the end.
-Quaaaaaaa!!
Just a few seconds after they dived into the Daedonggang River divine flames erupted that incinerated the secret base.
I survived today!
It was winter.
* * * *
The Lord of Chaos has disappeared.
The demons who witnessed all of this could not hide their miserable feelings.
Damn Lionheart...
The annihilation of the Lord of Chaos and his legions. More than ten of the Prime Evils died.
The greatest damage ever since the great war that began 200 years ago.
Among the demons of the demon realm which boast a long history there is a uniquely old existence.
Great Old One.
They could be said to represent the history of demons having survived the long history of struggle in which even the same demons betrayed and cheated each other.
That's why I'm against it. To kill him but to use the Old Ones in great history like Rakshaar as consumable war weapons.
“Was there an alternative? Rakshaar agreed to this national judgment.”
Demons suffered fatal damage two hundred years ago.
Starting with Malus the lord of chaos Karakael the lord of wisdom and Dotradon the lord of pleasure fell at the hands of the Lionheart.
It's not just them. Even after destroying the empire in just a few days he had to endure decades of wars of attrition because he could not destroy the smaller Lion Heart.
He knocked down countless Holy Grail Knights and annihilated all members of the world except for Lionheart but he was unable to win.
How many other great demons died in the meantime? Prime demons of all factions suffered damage that could not be repaired for thousands of years to come.
In order to recover the damage the invasion of another dimension was accelerated... but everything was disturbed when the one who could not be killed returned to Earth.
We should have saved up our strength for victory in the millennium. We should have given up on Earth without ignoring our wisdom.
Great Old Ones of Wisdom and Search. Having faced the Lion Heart King himself Chi shuddered as if trembling.
“Are you giving up on Earth-level attacks like this?”
An Old One of Wisdom who shook his head at the opinion of an Old One.
They learned the Gate technique. The Queen who was a candidate for the Lord of Pleasure and Corruption also collected the coordinates of the Pandemonium. If given time she will grow stronger and come here.
“······.”
The Old Ones shuddered as they remembered the day Lionheart would visit the Pandemonium himself.
Didn't he already devastated the territory of the Grand Duke of Slaughter and came to the Glacier Continent to find Vulcanus?
The Pandemonium is not a simple physical dimension like a planet but if you learn the coordinates one by one it is not difficult to move over to the subspace movement technology called the gate.
Now we have to choose.
Should I save my strength and hide in the back roads of the dimension for a rematch?
“Did you hold hands with the beasts?”
Did you ask for help from a more powerful monster?
Since the last monarch who created all the resources is dead I wonder if there is a choice.
Singularity in two dimensions.
Enemy that has constantly evolved by killing each other.
Only the ‘beasts of that dimension' are bizarrely powerful.
* * * *
Eventually it's open but it's open.
Do you see it?
The old beast stared at the far-off universe that its owner looked up at.
Exactly ‘fake universe'. Those who were afraid of them drove them into this place and tried to tie them up by sealing the dimension.
In my opinion it seems that natural extinction was expected in this polar region...
‘We survived in this extreme land and you guys failed.'
they are survivors. Warriors who make even the endless struggle a game.
The reason why ferocious fighters who would normally wield axes against each other were torn to pieces here and did not self-destruct in a civil war is because the great Khan of absolute charisma exists.
Should I kill them all?
The sage of the great beasts revealed his master's intentions with wild words that did not deviate from his birth.
Their lord was fine. Now even dealing with the ‘fourth' would be boring.
The only thing worth fighting for was the strongest of the monarchs the Lord of Destruction. After that guy even the same level as the monarch was insignificant.
And it was determined by this contact that they also had no energy.
The one who crushed the skull last was the lord of lust.
Before that I heard the news that the snakehead that did something wisdom had died so I didn't know if there would be a remaining monarch.
And if there is no one stronger than the lord even demons are insignificant to him.
Let's hear where and how much they offer.
A speculation that seems to be raised from the depths of the abyss. A tyrannical aura that would make even the champions of fighting spirit and shamanic gods fear.
This is the champion among champions chosen by all the ‘orc gods'.
The Great Khan will do as he wishes.
Orc Great Khan Murka.
The champion of the Orc Gods who destroyed the lords of slaughter indolence and lust and tore apart dozens of great demons with his own hands.
A great fighter and cunning one.
He looked at the unsealed dimension and smiled ferociously.

chapters.title: Chapter 230
chapters.content:
post-processing
It's a historic moment.
Against the background of the ruins of Pyongyang President Andong-gil stood on the podium.
80 years ago since the national tragedy began—
Even as President Andong-gil recited his prepared speech his heart was filled with excitement.
And Dong-gil the first president of North-South reunification!
How good is this sound?
President Ahn became the president who achieved the long-cherished desire of the nation the reunification of the two Koreas.
There were many sacrifices.
During the war hundreds of thousands of North Korean soldiers including 3 million citizens of Pyongyang turned into monsters and perished.
We must not forget their sacrifice. Having finally achieved unification after a long history of division we are on the road to reconciliation—
It was a problem from now on. The problem of assimilation of North Korean people and regional stabilization. Above all we need to recover from the annihilated satellite.
But don't worry. We are the people who achieved the Miracle on the Han River and we have eternal friends by our side.
Well the pantheon will do everything.
The protagonists of this war! Introducing our eternal companions who will continue to be with our unified Korea!
President Ahn thought it was fortunate that there was a pantheon.
* * * *
Good work on your speech President Ahn.
Ha ha just thank you for coming to the podium.
The speech declaring a unified Korea was held in occupied Pyongyang under the strong will of President Ahn.
No matter how much Pyongyang was occupied with communism the proclamation of a unified Korea in Pyongyang where remnants of demons may remain is dangerous.
The Presidential Security Service asked not only its own security personnel but also the Pantheon Shrine to join them and treated them as the protagonists of this proclamation ceremony.
There are Lion Heart King and knights but who can harm the president?
By the way President Ahn. What are you planning to do next?
At Leon's question President Ahn let out a light sigh and recalled the problems he was facing.
It was necessary to wipe out and absorb the remaining remnants of the North Korean army and it was necessary to dispatch South Korean troops to each region to occupy actual territories.
Although the post-processing was easy thanks to the Baekdu lineage of the North Korean Kim family and high-ranking officials there are still several forces that have not accepted the fall of the republic.
Specifically the warlords who watched the situation with bated breath as the devil took over North Korea.
‘The resistance forces who fought against the demons are on the better side but they're not on our side.'
Partisans were still active in Hamgyeong-do and they would act as a nuisance to the Armed Forces for a while.
First of all the appeasement of the remaining people in North Korea must be accomplished. The reason why the declaration of unification was brought forward today was also to show them the reality.
I see there's no point in resisting anymore so you're telling me to hurry up and find the light.
To put it bluntly it is. Anyway they will also become Korean citizens now.
President Ahn quietly suggested the most important thing to Leon.
Your Majesty and the Mansinjeon can be of great help to our nation's long-cherished business.
I guess so.
Leon understood President Ahn's intentions. After unification the biggest problem is the absorption of North Koreans and the stabilization of the new territory.
The immediate problems are food and security.
Yes of course our government will do everything possible...
Don't worry President Ahn. I will do my best to help.
your majesty···!
President Ahn had a bright face as if he was thrilled. But he knows too.
In the story of kings and kings there is never a free exchange.
If something is received from this side giving something back is also the basis of political dynamics. Lionheart-style court politics is more dignified but fundamentally it is not much different from modern politics.
We will actively support the missionary work of the Mansinjeon in the occupied territory.
Huh wasn't the government supposed to maintain religious neutrality?
If you put Goddess Demera's doctrine or Ariana's doctrine first you can crush them moderately. Security education and food self-rescue measures are important.
South Korea is a wealthy country but that doesn't mean it can feed over 20 million poor North Koreans for free.
By applying the doctrine of Goddess Demera each region can produce its own food and if terrible malnutrition and chronic diseases are cured even medical problems can be solved.
Above all if we teach them well the principles of Ariana the goddess of light and justice we will be able to greatly reduce future conflicts between North and South Koreans.
I don't mean to say that North Koreans are evil beings from birth but the more backward the country the poorer the education environment the more general morality is lacking in many cases.
Aren't the majority of North Koreans living on a North Korean drug called ‘Bingdu' right now? Only when this is resolved will future exchanges be smooth.
“There is one more thing. This will require a somewhat bold decision for President Ahn.”
What is that...?
Give Pyongyang to Jim.
Give up Pyongyang. At that even President Ahn was at a loss for words.
Even though it is an empty city where 3 million Pyongyang citizens and leaders were massacred the meaning of Pyongyang in North Korea is great.
For the past 80 years North Korea has developed only Pyongyang and its neighboring cities amid poor economic power and all facilities and infrastructure were concentrated in Pyongyang.
The reason President Ahn dared to come all the way to Pyongyang to hold the proclamation of a unified Korea is because this is such a symbolic city.
I can't believe it...
Are you planning on establishing your own kingdom here? At President Ahn’s gaze Leon smiled and shook his head.
I recognize the legitimate territory of the Republic of Korea. I have no intention of usurping the territory of a sovereign country.
The reason Leon asked for Pyongyang to be handed over was surprisingly simple.
The world tree has been planted here. As long as the goddess of forests and trees dwells there I must take care of this place and assist her in her work.
Ah the world tree...
President Ahn looked at the World Tree which was the background of the unification proclamation ceremony just before.
The world tree that grew tall on behalf of the Ryugyong Hotel was as tall as the universe.
And it's still growing to the point where I'm wondering if humanity develops an orbital elevator and it won't grow to that size.
In the past when I committed a mortal sin to serve the Moon Goddess I moved the cornerstone of the temple to the moon by climbing up and down the World Tree. Irmin personally spread the branches to the moon for me.
Did you reach the moon?
Yes. It may be difficult now but we need to create an environment for him.
It was a great story.
According to Leon doesn't it mean that a huge structure with the possibility of an orbital elevator will be created in Korea on this Korean peninsula?
-gulp!
Even President Ahn a non-expert thought about it for a moment.
That Your Majesty... The Special Self-Governing City is not something we can just give permission to if we want...
Such an enormous facility must be placed under the administration of the government. I want to maintain a friendly relationship with the Pantheon but even if that's not necessarily a plan to allow the Autonomous City——
Will Irmin be managed by the government?
Umm...!
President Ahn is speechless at Leon's words who immediately understood his intentions.
It's okay to put an example like Vatican City. It's a little bigger than that but the goddesses and forest sages who rule the autonomous city will respect you.
Yes? Isn't His Majesty the head of state?
Leon responded with a chuckle.
I am the Lionheart of Lionheart. The World Tree and its sages have been my strongest allies but they are not in a vertical relationship.
Of course since there are no tree men and fairies to take care of and rule this place right now Leon will have to take the place.
Geemm... First of all we'll prepare to convince public opinion with the meeting. Maybe it won't be too difficult if it's public opinion about the pantheon.
I'd rather cheer Leon to the National Assembly right now! It is a situation that cries out and even though Leon will not rule it directly a landlocked country with a close commission to Leon will be created.
Considering that this war was not simply a South Korean security issue but a global crisis this level of demand was not excessive.
That's right Your Majesty. I have information to give to Your Majesty regarding post-war issues.
Something?
“It’s the story of ‘The Resistance.’”
President Ahn immediately told him the story he had heard through Cheon Jin-soo and Kang Jin-seong.
Would you like to go see them now?
President Ahn secretly guided Leon expecting the treatment he would receive.
* * * *
The inside story of the war was revealed through the testimonies of the North Korean hunters who joined the armed forces the New Sword Guild and the Cheongseong Guild.
They hijacked two guilds from a special envoy plane fired missiles at Mansinjeon charter planes and sent a number of air force units to South Korea to defect to South Korea.
These seemingly contradictory acts were desperate maneuvers of their own.
“On the day the Republic fell the demons told the remaining generals.”
Come under the command of the devil and live an immortal life.
In the midst of that chaos the remaining North Korean soldiers made their own choices. Most of them chose subservience——
You guys chose to resist?
The old man answered the military inspector's question with a strong gaze.
Even though I've eaten people in the past I couldn't sell my own people to demons. Is that what people do?
Listed by Ri Cheol-ung deputy commander of North Korea's General Guard.
He was a member of the bodyguard who was loyal to the Kim pigs who sucked the people's blood while doing all sorts of dirty work.
Even he saw that this was not the case.
The evil act of corrupting people's souls and selling their own people to the devil was an atrocity that even those who did not believe in God could not do.
He chose resistance by mobilizing a considerable number of North Korean troops including the Guard General Bureau Reconnaissance General Bureau 5 Corps and 6 Corps but most of the People's Army had already chosen to submit to North Korea.
They made an extreme choice because they couldn't afford to deal with even the demons in a situation where even they were difficult to deal with.
We brought in South Korea out of curiosity. If we attack South Korea South Korea will have no choice but to go to war with the Republic.
As long as the charter plane is attacked South Korea has no choice but to start a war with North Korea.
Thanks to that the demons had no choice but to start a war with South Korea earlier than they planned.
In a way it was no exaggeration to say that he was the number one contributor to this war.
Just one thing.
It took just one thing.
The military inspector glanced over the glass tube of the investigation room while organizing the testimony of the head of the resistance.
You can't see it from here but you can see it from there. Indeed what kind of judgment will he make...
So what are we going to do now?
Lee Cheol-woong wanted to know his place in a unified Korea.
He is the leader of the remaining North Korean forces and the number one contributor to this war.
I hope that if I appeal to that point I will be able to preoccupy my own position in a unified Korea.
Of course it will not be possible to wield absolute power like before but the fact that South Korea is a democratic country can also be used.
He who oversaw the remaining North Korean troops and carried out resistance activities represents North Korea... No he is the only Linmin hero.
In a unified Korea the people of North Korea should also be given the right to vote and of course there is no choice but to elect members governors and mayors to represent North Korean regions.
If he put himself the hero of Linmin and his subordinates in that place... he would be able to enjoy enough power though not as much as in the past.
He is a man who has the courage to refuse a terrible option that is completely incomprehensible but he is a senile politician who has risen to the rank of deputy commander of the General Guard in the North Korean political world where a slight movement can blow his throat.
He was a man with the ability to expand his power even in the midst of this chaotic post-war process.
That doesn't seem to be a matter for us to decide.
What is that...
It was then. The door to the investigation room opens and a bunch of people enter.
A Yankee in a bluish suit and a mass of armor exhaling a strange breath of flame behind him. Even a boy who just got out of his boyish tee who doesn't fit at all in this place.
Leon and Vulcanus and Kim Jae-hyeok.
The Pantheonists who watched them through the mirror looked down at the aging leader of the resistance.
“You are the famous pantheon——”
I'm sorry! Can't I get down on my knees right now!
Turn it off?!
A loud voice resounds in an enclosed space. After a little more it wouldn't be strange if his eardrums burst. After the lion the old general's knees gave way.
Your Majesty will command you! Be polite and accept it wholeheartedly!
That what is that...
Leon looked down at Ri Cheol-woong ignoring the protests that were not his.
According to the laws of the kingdom the crime of trying to damage the body. It is appropriate to destroy the soul... but since it has its own merits it is not unheard of to mitigate the crime.
Yes Your Majesty! Then should I slit your throat!?
Mere death instead of soul annihilation. It was a very lenient treatment for Lionheart's high treason.
But Leon shook his head and decided to be more lenient.
They are not believers. There is no God who will accept their souls when they die. Earthlings need to be considerate of their position.
Hmm so is he!
So I will find out the connection with this so-and-so and the soldiers under his command in the crime of injuring Ok-che and decide the severity of the punishment.
So lenient treatment of mere worm serf candidates...! You Vulcanus I am thrilled!
No what the heck are these things?
First of all this so-and-so and the generals in charge are sentenced to 5 years in prison as freed people and scheduled serfs. Jim himself ordered lenient treatment so we should not die.
I will order the knights!
When Ri Cheol-woong who could not keep up with the conversation between the two made a dumbfounded face Kim Jae-hyuk who followed as an assistant... more precisely as an interpreter whispered in his ear.
“You are now a serf.”
There was also Kim Jae-hyeok on the charter plane that the missile dropped.

chapters.title: Chapter 231
chapters.content:
public support
There was a proclamation ceremony for a unified Korea but it had not yet taken over all of North Korea.
However more urgent than that was the mission to support the people in the occupied North Korean region and it was necessary to solve the problems of people's cooperation and food and medical care.
Fortunately the Armed Forces were veterans who were successful in such missions to support the people and the mission to support the people in preparation for unification had been prepared for a long time so there was no problem.
The problem was the Knights of the Pantheon who were in charge of supporting the people around Pyongyang...
“Is it very different from what you thought?”
The Armed Forces officer admired the Mansinjeon knights who were active on the battlefield.
they were ruthless
Unbound by the Geneva Conventions the Human Rights Ordinance and the laws of war they brutally trampled on their enemies.
In particular there was no forgiveness for the North Korean army which is a follower of the devil and the treatment was so vicious that even the South Korean military even talked about it.
That's why I was worried that such ruthless governance would not be applied to the civilian aid missions dealing with the North Korean people.
But what is it? Aren't the residents of occupied territories occupied by the Knights more obedient than I thought? In particular the area occupied by the Knights of the Burning Sword the original Knights of the Lion Heart had a particularly high evaluation score.
‘At first glance it looks like it's going to break but that's not it. He's friendly enough to the point where you wonder if he's the same person as the general public.'
Supporting the people of the occupied territories is an essential virtue of the modern military.
It is because it is a great help just by gaining the favor of the residents and not acting hostilely through public facility maintenance or public livelihood support.
Do medieval knights in another world understand and do it? no.
Unlike the knights of modern Earth such as the Knights of Manshinjeon Naju the leaders are those who have lived with different values.
Nevertheless the degree of friendship with the powerless common people was very high.
‘Basically he has a strong affinity for humans. Is it because you're fighting with a different race like Orcs and Goblins?'
So an officer asked.
I looked at the state of aid to the people of the Mansinjeon unit. It was very successful. The residents are following suit. What kind of secret do you have?
To this question Leon replied with a shrug.
Carrots and sticks.
It was a more ordinary answer than I thought.
Why?
Oh no. It's a rather ordinary answer... I was expecting something special.
That's what it's like to deal with the people. Make sure to reward and punish them and as a ruler give them the confidence that you will keep them full and safe. Then they too should be loyal to the king and nobles.
It was the basic of the basics of the ruler. It was a problem because I couldn't keep the basics.
“Isn’t it emphasized throughout your scriptures?
Have you read the Confucian scriptures? You are very knowledgeable.
It's much better than democracy.
Kuh keuhum...!
As a soldier in a democratic country and an officer standing in front of a nobleman of the times it was an embarrassing statement that could neither be affirmed nor denied.
“Rather than that everyone is unexpectedly well versed in medical knowledge right?”
The officer saw the flaming sword knights who were evasive and supporting the people.
They were born combatants but what surprised them most was their extensive medical knowledge.
It was mainly for external injuries but the Lionheart Kingdom always consumed the blessed crops so it was natural that there would be no disease in the body.
Sir Raihar! I brought a patient here! He's from the next town!
Behold North Koreans have been visiting the barracks of the Knights of the Burning Sword even though there is a military medical unit nearby.
“Sir Hari lie down over here.”
It was an awkward sight to see a member of the Holy Grail in armor taking care of the patient but Lord Raihar skillfully examined the patient.
“Where did the old man come from because he was sick?”
Nu I can't see well...
It's in the middle of an old age... It's because I don't like eating. It's glaucoma so even the children who were cursed by the wizards of the School of Ruin had this disease... This is a very strange land.
Saying that Lord Raihar set fire to his fingers and immediately threw himself at the old man's eyes.
Kiaaaaaagh!
Uh-huh! Some kind of safety squeal! Quiet!
The old man stopped in pain as he pulled his ear lobe as if he were a child. Then she realized that the sparks in her eyes hadn't hurt her at all.
“This this this...”
Since you've driven away all the bad energy your eyes should be a bit clearer now.
It really was. The old man trembled as he realized that his eyes which had been dim until just now were as clear as the East Sea.
Nu eyes...
Surprised by the miracle that the eyes that had not been seen for 20 years had been cured Raihar slapped the old man's butt and pushed him away.
Go and eat some of the soup they give out get some education from Priest Choi and then go. Commoner girl over there! Stop occupying your seat bow and leave!
Go thank you! Thank you!
With a half-mad expression on his face the old man naturally went to the tent where the priests of Demera were gathered received instruction on the doctrine of the pantheon and returned.
Something warm or sacred or something ambiguous was unfolding but it didn't necessarily show only good scenes like this.
Mansinjeon People's Army Prisoner Camp.
People's soldiers who surrendered one after another after Pyongyang was completely occupied by the pantheon were held here.
Hey let go of this! Let go clearings and bastards!
The Yankees' minions! Dirty capitalists!
Most of the People's Army entered the concentration camp for prisoners of war but there were many who resisted.
Oh no! Let's have some!
Everyone calm down and go in your turn!
Mansinjeon Naju Knights. Kim Jae-hyeok and Han Su-ho tied up the young stormtroopers who were resisting partisan activities and brought them to the prisoner of war camp.
Sir Kim Jae-hyeok! Sir Han Soo-ho!
Sir Tarhan the prisoner of war camp manager greets the two at the entrance.
He was taking care of the prisoners and treating the injuries sustained in the battle with Rakshaar.
Ah Sir Tarhan. Are you feeling well?
He responded with a chuckle at Suho's polite attitude.
Hehe my body hurts. If His Majesty hadn't ordered a rest I would have rode a horse and headed for the battlefield.
“There are no big fights outside. Laihar is doing the boring work of treating patients and evangelizing.”
He said he'd rather have a fight.
It's okay but I envy you for smelling the outside air.
Even if there are resistance activities they are only small-scale guerrilla activities.
Their resistance was meaningless when the resistance army the largest faction of the remaining People's Army had already surrendered.
“By the way what about Lord Tarhan?
Are you okay? Without a judge or prosecutor...
“The Holy Grail Knights have the legal right to serve as judges in trials. In court this work is the prosecutor and judge.”
It's new but what the hell were the Lionheart knights like?
It's like the right to conscription or the right to war. Even so the uppermost class of society has a lot of legal rights.
It was a powerful authority that was easy to abuse but surprisingly they were honest elites who thoroughly handled their work through FM.
Well normally a judge appointed after studying Kingdom law is the case but in an emergency it can't be helped. We Lionhearts understand each other's rights and don't infringe on each other.
Even though everything was handled judiciously it seemed that the country was running well so there is nothing to say on this side either.
However if there is a little very little problem... Would the law be a little too harsh?
So what crime did these guys get brought to?
Hmm... those youth stormtroopers? They're friends but they seem to have harassed the residents a lot. This guy is looting—
Yaktaaaar? A soldier? Yaktaaaaar?
Jaehyuk wondered if he should say this at the sight of Sir Tarhan whose eyes had gone round but what to do when it was all his karma.
And there were dozens of reports of indecent assault... well it was a normal thing in that unit—
Petos one of them is going up.
Sir Tarhan draws his sword. The blazing sword represented his anger.
[I don't need a soul like this! Do you think I am a garbage incinerator?!]
Petos who rejected the souls of sinners offered to him asked the knights to do well in evangelism.
Aaaaaagh! The crazy tin catches the people!
Sah save people!
Oh Sir Tarhan. Let's not burn normal people to death but use them as labor force. I heard there's a shortage of people in Pyongyang serf brother? Starting from 3 years depending on the type of crime?
Jaehyuk you've been stained a lot too...
People's soldiers captured in this way were released according to the nature of their crimes and became civilians or were sentenced to serfdom after thorough interrogation.
My serf friends say they eat a lot of salted radish. We are similar.
How economical it is to be able to pamper a person for over ten years with a special meal mixed with water salt and a little sugar.
After accepting the miraculous ledger that the weekly food cost of 3000 serfs acquired in a week was around one million won the inspector general of the Armed Forces took a peek at the skin-to-bone serfs in the camp and rolled his pen.
Weekly meal expenses: 1000000 (KRW).
- Creepy!
Weekly meal expenses: 1000000 00 (KRW)
No problem. Thank you for your continued support Lord Tarhan.
The major also works hard.
After the war it has already been a week since the disbandment of military units near Pyongyang.
Prisoners at the Mansinjeon POW camp are guaranteed very humane treatment and a comfortable camp life.
······
······.
After reading the report that had been processed with Gara the ROK military leadership secretly covered the papers.
What we don't know.
We treat it as if the data were lost during the battle.
Oops the North Korean army's shells hit the data storage room.
It was one of the few useful things during the war.
* * * *
With the support of the Korean government and public opinion Manshinjeon is accelerating efforts to turn Pyongyang into a world tree sanctuary but the project has not been going smoothly.
We need additional manpower support for the new Pyongyang City resident process!
“Kyung Dae-seong is working hard but the problem is food delivery is a big deal!”
Although the pantheon has been greatly increased in power most of it is focused on military power.
The 10000 man-at-arms and sexual law knights were also active in the public support mission but they are far short of manpower to command and control the large city of Pyongyang and its vicinity.
However when we open our hands elsewhere the armed forces are too busy to help.
Originally the pantheon had the best existence to cover the rush of administrative work.
Iron and Blacksmith's Grail Knight Yakt Spinner.
The strong artificial intelligence of the future world and the absolute leader in electronic administrative work.
A workload that would take hundreds of years for ordinary humans took less than 10 seconds in Yappy's hands.
0.5 seconds to review. 2.5 seconds to sub plan after reviewing and simulating thousands of directions depending on the business case. The remaining 7 seconds are used to repeat the same task twice more.
Yapi who had such an overwhelming ability to handle tasks was currently absent. The reason is simple.
During the battle with Rakshaar Yapi suffered fatal damage to the power source that moved the once-shattered fuselage.
In the first place the broken reactor was a yapp that was driven by the unscientific power of divinity.
Not only did the function stop when the divinity was blocked but the damage was accumulated because Leon's armor was polished by excessive divinity operation.
It's been a week since the war ended like that.
Kikluk······.
Yapi nodded at the sight that slowly opened and stood up.
Unnatural listlessness as if power had not been supplied for a long time. It was a sluggish movement that was not common for Yapi a machine.
Check the surrounding landmarks. Information falsification.
Yapi knew this was a strange place. The most luxurious bedroom in Pyongyang. A normal yappy would have figured it out right away by comparing it with the data obtained by the spy robot but the search for information is strangely slow.
Above all the feeling of déjà vu as if the thinking itself had slowed down. It was when Yapi was embarrassed by her own strange sensations.
Oh! You're awake!
Yapi a red-haired girl ‘remembered' that the organism's name was Hanhari.
Hanhari the name of an organism.
Ah~ Still hard-spoken. Even if it's a ‘temporary body' doesn't it change a little since you've become cute after a long time?
What are you talking about this lowly organic matter.
Yapi as usual tried to come up with 108 ways to harass Han Hari but his search processor still didn't work so he tilted his head.
Kick?
And something feels strange. The usual voice processor or voice recognition function is obviously foreign.
Come on~ I'm here to wash you up but since you woke up after a long time shall we wash ourselves?
Ugh Hari supporting Yapi.
Don't touch it organic... body?
It's not your usual eye level. Yapi was dragged by Hari's lead because of the driving method that didn't have enough power and didn't know exactly ‘how' and was able to stand in front of the mirror in the bathroom.
······.
A cold round fuselage reinforced with star iron. A 360-degree omnidirectional high-performance camera eye that can grasp distances of hundreds of kilometers at a glance. Eight legs and mechanical arms that assumed high-speed maneuvering in urban combat.
Kick?
does not exist. not visible
The mirror which must have reflected her appearance due to its location was not the crystallization of her refined future technology——
How is it? Isn't it cute?
Gray hair sweeping across the floor as if it had never been cut and the high-performance camera eye that provided eight 360-degree viewing angles has been transformed into a clear and transparent silver color.
The inefficient clothes which Yappi always ridiculed as low-level cold protection for organisms were trying hard to cover the thick swollen chest and the cold and refined steel skin was replaced by soft and fragile skin.
Even Yappy whose search engine didn't launch could understand this.
Is Joe hot?
Ugh bad words!”

chapters.title: Chapter 232
chapters.content:
The reason why I, an all-around super robot, became an inferior organic beautiful girl (1)
With the armor completed thanks to Yaffe's desperate hammering Leon was able to secure victory.
It goes without saying that Leon who had won such a victory first tried to revive Yapi.
However the reactor and fuselage damaged in the battle with Rakshaar did not work even with divine resupply.
Iron Divine. Why is Lord Spinner not awakening?
In response to the Lion Heart King's question Heto expressed regret as if he was frustrated.
[I don't know if I can fix it even if I descend myself. Even if the power source the nuclear reactor is maintained the fuselage is too damaged. It has been contaminated by something foreign magic power.]
Heto guessed as he looked at Yapi's damaged body through Leon's field of vision. If you descend directly you will see it more clearly but the enormous divinity consumed for it is harmful to the pantheon.
“Vice what do you think?”
Apparently unlike the gods who can only be seen through the eyes of their Grail Knights or Guardians in the Pantheon Beatrice was able to touch and examine Yapi's torso.
Beatrice mobilized all her magical knowledge to look at Yappi and identified the cause.
Contaminated by Rakshaar's magical power. Except for the reactor and some parts protected by the divine this fuselage should be abandoned.
If all you need is a new fuselage good luck.
Leon with Heto's help separated Yapi's memories and the reactor.
Then what about Lord Spinner's new fuselage?
[·······.]
Hetoshi?
[Yafi has no choice but to do that. There is no one among us who has the knowledge to create that high-tech fuselage.]
Leon shook his head.
Yaffe needs a new fuselage to resurrect but Yappy has to make the fuselage himself?
Isn't that a contradiction?
[Well once Yapi opens his eyes he will find a way himself.]
What if?
[With our knowledge we cannot build or connect Yapi's high-tech fuselage. Then shouldn't we do it as a professional field?]
If you can't build a body build a ‘body'. First of all wouldn't it be possible to put Yapi's consciousness into the body to wake up and then Yapi to make the fuselage?
In short their idea of ??making a temporary body would not have been so outlandish. but······.
[Would you like a girl? I want to be a small and cute child.]
Demera the goddess of life and fertility disagreed with Petos the god of war.
[Spinner is a great warrior. If so wouldn't it be nice to have big kidneys and bulging muscles?]
[Hmm to be good at hammering it's good to have muscles attached. There is truth in the words of war.]
Heto the god of iron and blacksmiths agrees. However Fleur the goddess of dreams and death presents a different opinion.
[The original woman actively denies the opinion of war and iron. I have to take her factor from her original daughter's god director and make it into a beautiful girl's body.]
[Uh huh even if it's a muscle? It is right to claim to be a dependable warrior as the factor of Vulcanus.]
When Petos immediately asked back Ariana answered back this time.
[If you want to find a base factor wouldn't it be better to use Leon a knight of this goddess and an agent of the pantheon? Even in war they say they favor my knight more.]
[Leon is beautiful but he doesn't have the appearance of a mighty warrior. It would have been perfect if he was only 40 cm taller and weighed twice as much. Even though Vulcanus isn't cheap his physical beauty is worth seeing.]
[Have you seen this macho? It's gross if you're close to two hundred and three. There's nothing wrong with my knight's height and weight. War say no more opinions.]
[Unjust light!]
[Before applying the variable interest rate of the borrowed holy power do not act rashly in war.]
[Turn it off!]
After Petos sank only Heto was left with the idea of ??turning Yapi's new body into a thriving muscle fodder.
[No since I'm my blacksmith I have priority...]
[It is life that breathes vitality into the body and it is the forest that sprouts the body so the priority is not only you.]
Irmin the goddess of forests and trees was the creator of not only the tree men but also the big-eared race called fairies. Of course-
[I also like pretty and beautiful things. Even as a man Leon is better.]
[······Why don't women know the beauty of muscles?]
The god of the sea and waves secretly gave his opinion to Heto who was sullen.
[I think beauty is better.]
[Shut up the horny guy who makes beautiful women hang on the player statue.]
In this way it was decided that the body to resurrect Yapi would be a female body based on Beatrice.
Kkiruuk?!
Of course Yapi's own opinion was not included at all.
* * * *
In front of the Ryugyong Hotel where the world tree grew. The Knights of the Temple of Heaven and Man-at-Arms were in the middle of cleaning up their surroundings.
The downtown Ryugyong Hotel which was the center of the battle in Pyongyang was damaged in the aftermath of the battle and it was necessary to call in a lot of experts to clean it up.
‘Should I call a contractor?'
A lot of that too. When South Korea said that hundreds of heavy equipment would have to be mobilized in large quantities Leon dropped the plan.
‘There are serfs so why hire a separate labor force?'
I'm going to tear down all the buildings around the World Tree except for the important ones! Workers can use serfs so destroy them!
The number of serfs that the pantheon acquired in this war was staggering.
In collaboration with the government the ‘Devil Followers' KPA were ruthlessly sentenced to serfdom so the majority of the KPA were sentenced to serfdom according to the severity of their crimes and free labor was plentiful.
Go Comrade Overseer!
Don't talk to me carelessly serfs!
Hee...! Oh sorry!
Lord Galatan of the Knights Templar a flaming sword that ferociously slices the air with a whip. After bullying the lowly serfs he inquired about their business.
You're an insignificant serf. What's the reason you dirty the ears of a noble knight?
That that's...
The former People's Army serf cautiously opened his mouth in front of a steamy medieval knight who was more overbearing than a propagandist who said he had descended directly from the party.
Now please provide some heavy equipment needed for the work. How can a stone that weighs more than tens of kilos be moved with only human power-
The People's Army serf was at a loss for words when Galatan glared at him with an open gaze. As he whipped his whip with brute force the sound of his whip resonated ferociously.
Heeik...!
The serfs were trembling because of their great pore size. Galatan growled ferociously.
Have you seen these pathetic bastards! In the days when I ruled my land the serfs didn't complain even though they built the wall all day long!
I couldn't complain.
Those wretched bastards built the wall for 5 years but it's hard to lift a few stones why are you making this mess?
The longest life span of serfs in the Galatan estate is 5 years.
You guys are lacking nooooh! Nooooh! My today you guys I have to start with mental training again! Everyone stop working! Conduct corrective labor training!!
At first glance it seems comfortable to stop work but Lionheart's treatment of serfs can't be so merciful.
They'll soon be screaming for me to do the work.
Han Su-ho who was watching this asked Cheon So-yeon with a worried expression.
Is it okay? Isn't that like catching people like in Naju?
It's okay. They're the ones who were sentenced to ‘indefinite serfdom'.
Oh~
The serfs captured from the Grand Duke of Slaughter's territory were exhausted because they were demon followers with heinous crimes but the People's Army serfs were a bit ambiguous.
Basically minor crimes were freed so all the People's Army who were sentenced to serfdom were serious criminals but if that was a mortal sin that would tear the soul apart that wasn't the case either.
There were people like Ri Cheol-ung who had unavoidable circumstances and there were serfs who received 5-year or 10-year prison sentences after proper reform work.
Since they plan to guarantee their survival and release them as free people after their sentence is over the knights were moderately treated carelessly.
However indefinite serfdom is different. They actively followed the demons and if they died during execution they would even be absorbed into Lord Gratas' Bible.
In other words they are those who are sentenced to extreme punishments that do not matter even if they die and will not be comfortable even after death.
I hope everyone can hold out a little longer.
Huh? So-yeon what are you doing?
When Cheon So-yeon who was poisoned by the Lionheart-style thinking made an unexpected remark in the Knights of the Pantheon Suho snooped.
The more labor the better. That's all money.
······Sometimes you get more and more scared.
Leon said he was satisfied but it was Suho who wondered if modern people could do this.
Isn't that your sister over there?
Huh? Sister!
Suho approached Hari who was moving on horseback. Hari also found Suho and shook his hand.
“Suho are you doing well?”
Yeah. But behind my sister...
And I was speechless when I found a woman standing close behind him.
and······.
She was a great beauty.
The long tied hair looked soft at a glance and the distinct features and elaborate face were perfect as if the gods had sculpted them.
Above all the beauty of the girl was so great that it reminded me of one person.
‘It seems to resemble Queen Beatrice...'
no way. no it can't be
She opened her mouth to Suho who continued to appreciate her beauty without thinking about it.
“What are you trying to say organism name Han Su-ho?”
Eh?
A cold voice that seemed to cool down even the love of a thousand years. Above all Suho made an expression of disbelief at the familiar tone.
Stop can't you?
Yeah I can't believe it. Sir Yapi.
No that's nonsense...
Suho made an expression of disbelief but Soyeon who was following him was different.
Are you awake?
Uh Soyeon did you know?
It seems you haven't heard because you've been working on the camp side.
Since Cheon So-yeon was the leader of the knights she tended to receive all the latest information from the Mansinjeon.
“Hari-senpai what business did you bring?”
Sir Yapi tidy up your hair and eat something. You're not used to the human body yet.
I'll help too. Suho you go first.
Uh uh uh...
Traditionally when women play together men are not allowed to intervene. Regardless of whether it's correct to view Yapi as a biological woman.
* * * *
The door to the hair salon in front of the Ryugyong Hotel opened and a middle-aged woman greeted the customer.
Welcome fifty... Lady Han Hari! Captain Soyeon!
Mr. Han who ran a barbershop in Naju recognized the two at once.
Are you going to cut it?
Oh I'm fine. I'd like someone over here please.
Huh? Oh my gosh you're very beautiful~
Mr. Han couldn't help but admire Yapi.
Her hair was long like it had never been cut in her life but it was amazingly perfect.
Even the well-maintained hair of a popular idol won't be this shiny.
Come on sit down. It's used by North Koreans but it's in the middle of Pyongyang so the facilities are good. Wash your hair first—
Even though her hair was so long it was only a matter of shampooing it but touching her soft hair made Han feel better.
Come on how should I cut it?
Misem.
huh?
You can just push it away.
Mr. Han hesitates at Yapi's hot remark. Hari and Soyeon were also frightened and dissuaded them.
Oh Sir Yapi! Why are you shaving that head! What a waste!
The hair on the head is a crude cold protection tool for humans that evolved for survival. It does not apply to this machine. Shave it off with a shaved head for efficient activities.
So it took quite a long persuasion to dissuade Yapi's argument that it was right to push it out for efficiency.
No I can't cut it! I can't shave my pretty hair like this!
The struggle based on Mr. Han's professional ethics also played a part.
* * * *
Wow it's cut really nicely.
My hair is so good so even the basics worked well.
It doesn't make any sense.
Despite Hari and Soyeon's sincere compliments Yapi reacted bluntly.
Yappy who had long floor-length hair that was trimmed off to her buttocks still feels long and uncomfortable.
However I felt that it was inefficient to refute the desperate persuasion of the two people and the desperate opposition of Mr. Han a beautician who is willing to neglect his duty so I left the inferior cold protection organ of the organism.
It came from the feeling of being ‘annoying' but the current Yapi didn't know.
Then shall we eat?
The eating behavior of the organism is not interested in the inefficient act of charging power. I hope to secure nutrients only to move this inefficient mass of organic matter.
Eek~ It's a human body after a long time so you should try a lot of delicious things.
Hari said something regretful but Yapi looked at Hari miserably and looked down from above.
An organism's inefficient eating behavior is itself a proof of inferiority. Do you not even think about the energy wasted for the organism's eating behavior?
Yapi did not bend his will presenting the carbon emissions of livestock and the enormous waste of energy required to manufacture feed as evidence.
Then what do you want to eat? Combat rations?
The organism only needs to obtain the minimum amount of nutrients.
Saying that Yapi headed somewhere with awkward steps. It was a place where the people's army serfs sat on the ground and ate.
Sir Yapi?
So-yeon felt strong and tried to stop her but Yapi walked to the food table without hesitation.
Sufficient amounts of sugar-salt water and nutrients are sufficient.
Eek... would you like something like that?
Remembering the pain of eating only sugar-salt water in the past Hari hated it but Yapi sighed and accepted a glass of sugar-salt water distributed to serfs.
As long as the nutrients are satisfied it is sufficient.
Um then would you like to sit over there and eat?
You should eat slowly...
the two knew How salty that sugar salt water is and how simple it is to make your tongue tingle.
You have to drink it slowly one sip at a time so you can barely pass it over your throat so it is recommended to sit in a corner and consume it.
I can't be sick with these lowly serfs.
Yapi drank the sugar-salt water at once not paying attention to the glances of the lowly people's army serfs.
- Pooh!!
As expected Yafi pours out the sugar-salt water.
Sir Yapi! Are you okay?
Pu-hup! Phu-heb! Guweeek!
Yapi vomited and poured out all the sugar-salt water he drank.
What? Soreness. Pain. Pain. What is this?!
That's right... sugar salt water isn't it? A lot of sugar and salt...
How can you eat something like this!
Yappy throws a glass of sugar-salt water and breaks it. I thought of the People's Army serfs who were watching it with one mind.
”You guys fed us.”
Either that or not Yapi continued to vomit and was disgusted.

chapters.title: Chapter 233
chapters.content:
The reason why I, an all-around super robot, became an inferior organic beautiful girl (2)
It was about half a year ago that Rakshaar occupied Pyongyang.
This means that the large city of Pyongyang has passed half a year without any logistics movement and it was said that quite a few plants and infrastructure were destroyed.
A city is a deformed living system that cannot last even a month without an influx of food and materials from outside.
The ROK military which entered Pyongyang had to order large-scale supplies from South Korea immediately.
「Large Recruitment of Pyongyang Materials」
It is said that the supplies for the soldiers are solved with jjambab but the hunters were different.
The high-income hunters were not the ones to be satisfied with the army jjambab and each sent a large amount of professional chefs and necessary supplies from the guild headquarters.
Thanks to this the restaurants around the Ryugyong Hotel which they occupied one by one became the headquarters of luxury chefs.
Ah Princess Han Hari. Knight Commander Cheon So-yeon. Do you want to eat?
When the executives of Manshinjeon enter the president comes out and greets them.
Yeah~ How's the business going?
Hehe I have no time to rest because I'm trying to feed thousands of people every day.
Mansinjeon also hired a large number of local residents from Naju and brought them to Pyongyang.
It is said that the local commercial district of Naju was revitalized thanks to Manshinjeon but when the war slowed down local restaurant owners and employees were generously paid for their departure and everyone rushed to Pyongyang excitedly.
“The owner of the chicken restaurant next door fry a thousand chickens a day.”
Right chicken!
Hari flashed at the word chicken house and shouted.
Soyeon-ah I'll go and buy some chicken.
“That soy sauce.”
Hari gives a thumbs up and walks out the door. Only So-yeon and Yapi are left in her place.
What do you want to eat?
It doesn't matter as long as you have enough nutrients.
You just vomited up enough nutrients?
······.
When Yapi didn't say anything Soyeon roughly selected food from the menu.
I'll make the pork cutlet official.
Okay. Wow~ All three of you are very beautiful~
It was a compliment mixed with sincerity but Yapi pouted and showed no reaction.
The standard of organic beauty had no special meaning to her.
“Where is the fuselage of this machine?”
“It was completely destroyed and tainted by the demon lord’s magic.”
Soyeon told Yapi the story the gods had told her.
They said the only thing that could be salvaged was the reactor and memory data. The new fuselage must be made by Lord Yapi himself.
We have to hurry. This machine will get out of this savage organic body as soon as possible.
Does it look good?
this?
Yapi smiled and showed a rotten expression to Soyeon who was wiggling her hair.
It only has two eyes.
“Of course.”
If you only have two eyes how can you look behind you? And why can't you connect with the reconnaissance drone camera? If so how do you monitor the outside area?
Yapi's displeasure did not end there.
I only have two arms. How do I fix this if it breaks? How do I multi-task? First I need to attach a few more arms.
It's not even Asura what...
Weak armament. Lack of diversity in external armaments.
By the time Yapi was complaining about the limitations of humans bowls containing food arrived one after another.
The food is out.
Pork cutlet set meal with Korean-style pork cutlet hamburg steak fish cutlet and salad.
This is the biggest problem.
Pork cutlet set meal?
It simply symbolizes the inferiority of organisms that have to rely on their sense of taste to choose their food.
Yapi preached the efficiency that machines can operate for hundreds or thousands of days with only cheap electricity generated from nuclear reactors.
So the most perfect way of evolution is for all organic matter to be mechanized through cyberware modification. It is questionable that taste cells were not blown away even in this machine's world.
Yes yes at least eat it. Whether or not you remodel it later you have to eat for now.
Kick.
Yapi gave a dissatisfied look at So-yeon who overlooked her reasonable logical thinking but picked up the pork cutlet with her bare hands as if replenishing energy was the priority.
Why are you picking it up with your bare hands?
What's the problem?
It's dirty.
All you have to do is eat and clean up.
If you get it on your hand... uh I'll slice it so give it to me.
So-yeon who was worse off sliced ??the pork cutlet. So-yeon recommends cutting pork cutlet on a fork.
Sleep. Ah~
“Meat fried in oil has more calories than the daily recommended amount——sweet?!”
The pork cutlet is shoved into Hari's mouth as she tells a long story. Yapi's eyes widened as he unknowingly chewed it.
The combination of juicy and greasy tempura and sauce that bursts with each bite. Waste of energy due to excessive carbon emission and oil with poor absorption efficiency in the human body——
Kick?
The definitive version of carbon emission the main culprit of environmental pollution real meat made from slaughtered live livestock not 3D printed meat.
In addition the batter fried in high-temperature oil is crispy and the generous amount of demi-glace sauce is sweet.
It was a shock.
For a thousand years the first pork cutlet eaten by a machine that had never eaten before acquired an organic body caused a great electrical stimulation in Yapi's biological brain.
-shaking
Sir Yapi?
Without answering Soyeon's words Yapi hurriedly ate the pork cutlet. While sipping the mushroom soup and cola that came with it.
······.
Yapi who inhaled the pork cutlet meal in an instant suddenly noticed Soyeon's gaze looking at me.
is it delicious? Yapi avoids the gaze and makes excuses.
“It was an act of emergency evacuation to recharge energy.”
“Yes yes you would.”
He didn't know human language but Yapi guessed that it was making fun of him. I don't even know that it's a mindset that can't exist in a machine that only values ??facts.
The chicken is here! Hey Sir Yapi have you finished it already?
What else is that?
Yappy looks at the chicken box Hari brought.
“Hehe if you talk about traditional Korean food isn’t it seasoned chicken?”
“I just ate greasy high-calorie food. Eating greasy food again——”
Come on~ Try it first and decide!
The red seasoned chicken Hari offered brought a fresh shock to Yapi.
“What is this...?”
Ah~ This is ‘delicious'.
it's good?
It was the day I learned the concept that machines are delicious.
* * * *
After the meal the three headed to the top of the Ryugyong Hotel.
This desolate hotel which has been under construction for '50 years' with the determination to build a skyscraper that surpasses the 63 Building in South Korea has been completely seized by the roots of the World Tree since the demon lord Rakshaar made it the tomb of the World Tree.
However now that it has been functioning as a world tree by Koo Dae-seong Leon is staying by his side watching over it.
Only the exterior work has been completed and the interior work has been suspended for 20 years so the interior is very desolate but there was a story that interior repairs would be done at the pantheon level because of the symbolism that the world tree was used as a tombstone.
Sir Spinner are you here?
its top floor. Yapi was originally opened as a ramen suite where she bumped into Leon who was waiting for her.
your majesty.
Haha it's quite awkward because it's not the body I usually see.
Leon looked at Yapi who was born after the delicate work of the gods and smiled with satisfaction.
“Okay how about a new body?”
Discomfort······.
“Yes that’s right. If you want it’s okay to stay in that body but—”
Yapi shook his head. In order for Yapi to keep this body going she needs at least six more arms than she has now.
Yes if that's your choice then we should respect it. But...
As with any noble lady Leon kissed Yapi's hand and grinned.
“As a knight I regret that I will lose the opportunity to serve such a beautiful lady.”
Kikluk······.
The back of the hand is itchy. Yapi had seen Leon's daily manners over and over again but when he received it he felt a strange tickle.
‘It's the back of my hand that touches me but why does my body temperature rise? After all organic bodies are strange.'
Yapi thought he would have to make a new fuselage as soon as possible.
I have prepared the necessary facilities by ordering the following ones. There are enough special railroads so please make them according to your will.
Leon tapped Yapi on the shoulder and promised to support him if he needed anything.
As soon as he entered the prepared workshop Heto spoke to Yapi who was hesitant about what to do with the awkward human arm.
[The human body seems unfamiliar.]
Kick.
When Heto's voice reached my ears Yapi reacted awkwardly.
This machine's reactor is not installed. Is communication still possible?
[You are a Holy Grail Knight because you have a noble soul not because of the strength of your body.]
There is no substance called soul to this machine.
[Yeah that's right. The soul is not material.]
Yaffi raised the hammer.
Heavy star iron does not melt with moderate firepower.
What is needed to process this is not enormous firepower and high heat but a divine miracle that can bend even the heart of a star.
For the Holy Grail Knight a living saint Byeolcheol bends and takes shape just by meaning.
Yapi who hit the hammer to sharpen the bent star iron expressed dissatisfaction that something did not go the way he wanted.
I'm too short of a hand. I need an extra support arm.
There were numerous mechanical arms in Yapi's workshop. There were a lot of mechanical containers assembled by the network and there was also a high-tech facility that projected the blueprint in 3D and estimated the expected completion.
But what we have now is the body of an irrational organism. Dissatisfaction with it settled but Heto spoke in a stern voice.
[No matter what your body is you are my blacksmith and Lionheart's Holy Grail Knight. Clarify that your hammering is the power of a god that works miracles.]
Yaffi recalled the hammering at that time.
Recalling the words of the Holy Grail Knight Antalk recalling the moment Leon recognized him.
[You completed the Lion Heart King's armor in a much worse situation than now. Did you make it even when you were perfect?]
Thousands and tens of thousands of armors and weapons were produced but Yapi failed.
The star iron weapons that were automatically produced based on perfect blueprints were at best the level paid to soldiers and only the divine armor passed through the hands of Yaffy demonstrated the true power of star iron.
The Star Iron Armor is a vessel that holds God's miracles and blessings. We know from accumulated data that it was never determined solely by the fertility rate of star iron.
How much lack did you feel while watching the armor of vulcanus.
Looking at Leon's holy sword I sensed that this was a miracle that would not have happened even with my perfect calculations.
[The armor you completed is in no way inferior to the star iron armor made by the blacksmiths of past glory. You already have the skill set so all you need is a strong arm to hold the hammer.]
Long experience excellent technology and expensive materials.
That is what is needed to achieve 99% perfection.
The true 1% points come from hammering that works miracles.
This machine is a completely flawless existence.
With that stingy declaration hammer strikes.
The fully awakened blacksmith of God created a miracle according to his will.
* * * *
Speaking of results Yapi quickly returned to the body of a machine.
After three days and three nights of hammering eating only food brought by Hari and Soyeon Yapi quickly completed his fuselage and returned to the fuselage with a familiar design after an additional four days.
It's shiny because it's made of star iron. But why did you keep the size the same?
- Advantageous for connecting with other dedicated equipment.
Is there a need to fix compatibility with other platform armaments that have already been completed?
In addition Yapi who has now awakened as a perfect Iron Grail Knight will be able to proceed with the ‘ducal class' plan that has been postponed for a long time due to anguish over perfection.
By the way it's amazing. To be able to go back and forth between the human ‘body' and the robot's ‘body'.
Hari glanced at the capsule placed in the corner of Yafi's workshop.
Yapi's body created by the gods himself through the world tree sleeps with his eyes closed in a medical machine manufactured by Yapi himself.
-It was given by the gods. I can't just throw it away so I'll just keep it.
I'm sorry~
- What a pity inferior organism.
Yaffi climbs on Hari's head and slaps him with a mechanical arm. Hari responded with a smile at her familiar personality.
Well but Sir Yapi is Sir Yapi. Sometimes I move to my physical body and go out to eat!
- This machine will not participate in inefficient eating behavior.
A yappy who speaks loudly.
and the next day.
······.
······.
Naju Manshinjeon Chicken Branch.
The gray-haired girl we met at a chicken restaurant selected for the knights' group dinner mumbled a chicken leg in her mouth with a puzzled expression.
You say you're inferior?
Manshinjeon... Market research for chicken franchises.
You're groovy!
Even after that gray-haired silver-eyed beautiful girls were often found so it must be that all of this was a market research with a deep meaning for the Yapi franchise.

chapters.title: Chapter 234
chapters.content:
Newcomers (1)
An intangible aura that distorts even space-time. The convergence of that enormous power savagely swallows the air.
The moment the hammer struck——
-Quaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!
The terrain changes with hammering.
- Wow... Crazy.
-That's fucking ridiculous.
After the world's communication satellites crashed the satellites that were urgently launched brought the world together again.
To be precise developed countries that have the power to build their own network infrastructure recovered half-global networks but the first thing they searched for after the Internet was restored was the 2nd Korean War.
Video records recorded for wartime record collection were released in South Korea as soon as the Internet was restored.
To show off the victory of South Korea against the demon lord and the fact that the Korean Peninsula has finally been reunified after 80 years of division.
